short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record audio from any website, identify different speakers, and generate voice clones for Call Strike app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to record audio from any website, identify different speakers, and generate voice clones. These voice clones can then be used in our Call Strike website.
